text: Ma timisita yo bhandinam ki masita allahako khajana cha ra nata yo ki ma adrsya kuro jandachu ra nata yo bhanchu ki ma pharista hum ra na tiniharuko barema kehi bhandachu, jasala'i timile helako drstile herdaichau, ki allahale tiniharula'i ramro pratiphala dinechaina. Juna unaka hrdayama chan, tyasala'i allaha jandacha. Yadi ma yasto bhanchu bhane nihsandeha atyacariharumadhyeko hunechu
